title: Macau Legend Shares Fall Following Arrest of CEO
body:
Macau Legend Development ’s shares fell as much 30% after Macau media reports of the arrest of its chief executive officer over the weekend, on suspicion of money laundering and illegal gambling including the operation of online casinos.
Police said the arrest of the hotel and casino operator’s chief executive Chan Weng Lin was directly linked to the arrest of Suncity chief executive Alvin Chau, who was detained in November on suspicion of operating an illegal gambling syndicate and money laundering, local media reported.
